snippet.title: Holiday Peppermint Bark
snippet.description: Holiday Peppermint Bark makes for a great presentation, and it's easy to do! Add it to your list of Holiday Gift Ideas.

snippet.title: Nerds Popcorn
snippet.description: What could be better at your child's next party but Nerds Popcorn! This treat is sure to be a hit with children of all ages.

snippet.title: Easy Pumpkin Ice Cream
snippet.description: An easy pumpkin-flavored ice cream to satisfy your sweet tooth.

snippet.title: Brownie with Truffle Mousse
snippet.description: Elegance and sophistication is the hallmark of this rich and decadent chocolate brownie dessert with creamy truffle mousse. Beautifully decorated with fresh strawberries, this prize-winning dessert is perfect for your next holiday party! Created in the kitchen of Jennifer Lynch of Alden, NY, this 1st Prize winning recipe is a sure hit.

snippet.title: Maple Walnut Fudge
snippet.description: Sweet, smooth and scrumptious. Try this mouth-watering recipe for maple walnut fudge.

snippet.title: Hot Cocoa Mix In A Jar
snippet.description: Ah, is there nothing finer after a day in the snow than curling up on the sofa with a hot cup of cocoa?
